name: Bedlam at the Harvest Festival
description:
A short deduction where you need to follow documents and clues.

Submission to Ludum Dare 52, with the theme being Harvest.

The goddesses were not pleased with this year's Harvest Festival.

The skies woke red, the wine turned sour and the crops began to rot.

This only happens if all goddesses are displeased.

Find out what went wrong at the festival and name who offended each goddess.

They will be sacrificed.

Spare no mercy. 

All citizens of this village who erred, either through intent, disattention, weakness or the guidance of others must die.
